price: (Yanantegetse) kumvira mama, kandi ntiyangize umwibone cyangwa ngo angire umunyabyago.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
